mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (memberId, productId, amount, method, paidAt) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{amount}, #{method}, #{paidAt})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) AS totalSales FROM payment;

SELECT
FORMATDATETIME(paidAt, 'yyyy')
FORMATDATETIME(paidAt, 'yyyy-MM')
FORMATDATETIME(paidAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AS label, SUM(amount) AS amount FROM payment WHERE FORMATDATETIME(paidAt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY label ORDER BY label

SELECT m.name AS memberName, pd.name AS productName, pm.paidAt AS date, pm.amount AS amount FROM payment pm LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON pm.memberId = m.memberId LEFT OUTER JOIN product pd ON pm.productId = pd.productId WHERE paidAt BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND pd.name = #{name}
